translations.translation: Its collection and recitation are Our affair.
Surely its collection and recitation are Our responsibility.
Surely it is for Us to have you commit it to memory and to recite it.
We shall be responsible for its collection and its recitation.
Indeed assembling the Qur’an and reading it are upon Us.
It is for Us to collect it and that it be recited.
Surely on Us (devolves) the collecting of it and the reciting of it.
Ours it is to gather it, and to recite it.
Lo! upon Us (resteth) the putting together thereof and the reading thereof.
We Ourself shall see to its collection and recital.
Verily upon us is the collecting thereof and the reciting thereof.
Indeed it is up to Us to put it together and to recite it.
It is for Us to collect it and to promulgate it:
It is for Us to collect it and to give you (O Muhammad SAW) the ability to recite it (the Quran),
It's gathering and reciting is upon Us.
Upon Us is its collection and its recitation.
Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.
[75:17] Assuredly it is for Us to bring it together, in your breast, and to recite it, your reciting of it, that is, its flowing off your tongue.

(Lo! upon Us (resteth) the putting together thereof) preserving the Qur'an in your heart (and the reading thereof) and also preserving the reading of Gabriel to you; it is also said that this means: upon Us rests its composition of the lawful and the unlawful.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ } معناه علينا أن نَجمعَهُ في صَدرِكَ
 وأن نُؤلفَهُ
 ويقال: حِفْظهُ وتَأليفَهُ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: لا تخف { إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ } في خاطرك وضميرك { وَ } أيضاً علينا بعد جمعنا { قُرْآنَهُ } [القيامة: 17] وقراءته على لسانك على وجهه بلا فوت شيء منه، لا تتعب نفسك بالعجلة، ولا تستعجل بالالتفاظ قبل الالتمام
